christmas gingerbread man adding a face and decoration once i had made my two gingerbread man shapes i then took one i picked to be the front and made sure the rs was facing me i attached all decoration at this point it is far easier when you can sew with access to both sides of your fabric please see note 2 and picture 2 for notes on eye placement once the eyes were in place i chose 3 buttons to sew down the front and used some surface crochet and some red embroidery thread to form a smiley mouth however if you enjoy embroidery then i am sure you can create some wonderful patterns and decoration for your man alternatively if your gingerbread man is going to be a decoration rather than a toy and only handled by older people you can go mad with glitter and sparkle and fabric glue please ensure your decoration is safe for the purpose it is intended for i would love to see what you come up with sewing and stuffing your man together place the wrong sides of your two pieces together with the face upwards and line up your stitches so you can crochet through the front and back piece as one attach your white yarn to the gingerbread man in the following place righthanded crocheters attach your yarn on your right side your gingerbread mans left about 4 stitches below the armpit single_crochet in 3 sc3tog under the armpit then go to * see pic 3 lefthanded crocheters attach your yarn on your left side your gingerbread mans right about 4 stitches below the armpit single_crochet in 3 sc3tog under the armpit then go to * see pic 3 *crochet evenly around your man using single_crochet place approximately 1 single_crochet into each row end and 1sc into each single_crochet use a sc3tog under both armpits in both neck creases and in the dk version only i used sc3tog between the legs see pic 3 make sure the centre of your sc3tog is at the centre of these narrowed points once you have got back to the beginning slip_stitch to your 1st st and sew in your ends important read first before stitching around the starting point of stiching around the edge has been specifically chisen to allow for simple stuffing once you have finished
